text: The Canadian National Railway Company () is a Class I railway. Its headquarters are in Montreal, Quebec. It serves Canada and both the Midwestern and Southern United States. In 2011, Bill Gates was the largest single shareholder of CN stock. CN owns around 20,400 route miles (32,831 km) of track in eight provinces. There is also a 70-mile (113 km) stretch of track into the Northwest Territories, to Hay River on the southern shore of Great Slave Lake. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1922 establishments in Canada Category:Companies based in Montreal Category:Companies listed on the New York Stock Exchange Category:Companies listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange Category:Rail vehicles manufacturers Category:Organizations based in Montreal Category:Transport companies
title: Canadian National Railway
